title: Leveraging polymer architecture design with acylamino functionalization for electrolytes to enable highly durable lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02218A, Paper
Jiayu Zheng, Lingyan Duan, Hang Ma, Qi An, Qing Liu, Yongjiang Sun, Genfu Zhao, Hanlin Tang, Yang Li, Shimin Wang, Qijun Xu, Lilian Wang, Hong Guo
A novel polymer architecture design for GPEs is proposed via in situ copolymerization of VC and a new acylamino-crosslinker. This design enables accelerated Li+ transport and dual-reinforced stable interfaces, contributing to long-lifespan LMBs.
